tutee.name: Josef Roderigo
tutee.strength: Bobby has been an outstanding student to work with. His enthusiasm for learning and dedication to his studies are truly commendable. He consistently demonstrates a strong work ethic and a genuine passion for acquiring knowledge.
tutee.weakness: Bobby's math skills are rated at 5 on a scale of 1 to 10, indicating an average proficiency. With some dedicated effort and additional practice, Bobby has the potential to strengthen his math abilities and reach a higher level of competence.
